title: Therapeutic potential of Thai herbal formula for cognitive impairment: A metabolomics approach for Comprehensive Insights
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Pravit Akarasereenont, Saracha Pattanapholkornsakul, Suveerawan Limsuvan, Dollaporn Mamaethong, Suksalin Booranasubkajorn, Narawut Pakaprot, Pinpat Tripatara, Kajee Pilakasiri
